name: Eyeball Money Game Where You Shoot Blobs
name_original: Eyeball Money Game Where You Shoot Blobs
description:
Made for Remington Creative's Chaos Jam hosted by Barndles.

This game is bad, but I wanted to make something.

Controls:

WASD to move
Left Click to shoot and spend
Right Click to open up your shopping menu.

Differences Between Hard and Safe mode:
In safe mode you can spend money to remove ads.
In hard mode you cannot, also the ads are for real companies.

Shopping Menu:

You can buy three things with your money
For 10 coins you can remove all ads (In safe mode)
For 30 coins you can heal
for 50 coins you can kill all enemies on screen.

The window title will show your total score when you die.
